ai.summary: A 13 km parkland walk through Petworth's Capability Brown landscape, offering rolling manor grounds, woodlands, and open vistas with a taste of historic landscape design.
ai.terrain_summary: Gently undulating parkland with a mix of gravel, compacted dirt, and grassy paths. Paths are generally well-maintained but can be uneven or muddy after rain, with occasional gates and elevation changes.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather and wear sturdy footwear suitable for fields and mud. Bring water, a lightweight jacket, sun protection, and a small first-aid kit. Carry a map or offline navigation, and stay on public rights of way. Be mindful of livestock, watch for uneven ground near field edges, and keep dogs under control and clean up after.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (Aprilâ€“October) when paths are drier and views are at their best; winter trails can be wetter and muddier.

seo.title: Capability Brown's Parkland Walk, Petworth - 13 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a 13 km moderate hike through Petworth's Capability Brown parkland, featuring rolling landscapes, woodlands, and historic estate scenery in the United Kingdom.
